data.description: Settings for Entity Framework domain data.

enableMigrations.description: Indicates whether or not EF code first migrations should apply.
enableMigrations.title: Enable Migrations

connectionString.description: The connection string for entities and aggregates.
connectionString.title: Data Connection String

autoDetectChangesEnabled.description: Indicates whether the DetectChanges method is called automatically by methods.
autoDetectChangesEnabled.title: Auto Detect Changes Enabled

lazyLoadingEnabled.description: Indicates whether lazy loading of relationships exposed as navigation properties is enabled.
lazyLoadingEnabled.title: Lazy Loading Enabled

proxyCreationEnabled.description: Indicates whether or not the framework will create instances of dynamically generated proxy classes whenever it creates an instance of an entity type.
proxyCreationEnabled.title: Proxy Creation Enabled

validateOnSaveEnabled.description: Indicates whether tracked entities should be validated automatically when SaveChanges is invoked.
validateOnSaveEnabled.title: Validate On Save Enabled

enableMigrations.description: Indicates whether or not EF code first migrations should apply.
enableMigrations.title: Enable Migrations

stacks.description: The root configuraiton object for Stacks.
